item.title: Fall Out Boy - "The Take Over, The Breaks Over"
item.description:
Uhm baby
seasons change
But people don’t and
I’ll always be waiting
In the back room
I’m boring
But overcompensate
with headlines
And flash flash
flash photography
Don’t pretend you
ever forgot about me
Don’t pretend you
ever forgot about me

rather be

a divorcee

fashion magazines

a divorcee

don’t pretend

fight fair)

can be a prison
Then these are
just conjugal visits

dissect us ’til this

anymore (uh uh uh)

ever forgot about me
